reviewText: We used this for a 4-H educational program.  The use of raw trees helped so much for the kids to understand how the saddle actually sits on the horse versus how the saddle appears on the horse.
pretty good and informative dvd. saddle fit is so important and this video teaches a lot of great info mation

This is a great companion item to Joyce Harman's "The Horse's Pain-Free Back and Saddle-Fit Book". This DVD specifically addresses English Saddle fit. She helps viewers identify flaws in saddles and how to fit difficult horses. I recommend that readers/viewers get both the book and the DVD. For those who have Western saddles: The Western Horse's Pain-Free Back and Saddle-Fit Book: Soundness and Comfort with Back Analysis and Correct Use of Saddles and Pads, Joyce also has a book and a DVD that I also highly recommend.
